definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :La 2:19 child;—abs. [[עוֹלֵל]] 1Sa 15:3 +, [[עוֹלָל]] Je 6:11, Je 9:20; usu. pl. [[עוֹלְלִים]] Ps 8:3, [[עׂלְלִים]] Job 3:16, [[עוֹלָלִים]] La 4:4, Joe 2:16; cstr. [[עׂלְלֵי]] La 2:20; sf. [[עׂלָלַיִח]] Ps 137:9, [[עׂלָלֶיהָ]] Mic 2:9 +, [[עׂלְלֵיהֶם]] 2Ki 8:2 +, etc.;—child Mic 2:9, La 2:19, La 2:20, La 4:4; + [[יוֹנֵק]] (sts. disting. from men and women), 1Sa 15:3, 1Sa 22:19, Ps 8:3, Je 44:7, La 2:11, Joe 2:16, ‖[[בַּחוּרִים]] Je 6:11, Je 9:20; ‖[[בָּנִים]] Ps 17:14 (heirs of father); dashed in pieces ([[רטשׁ]]) by foe 2Ki 8:12, Ho 14:1, Na 3:10, Is 13:16, cf. Ps 137:9 ([[נִפֵּץ]]); taken captive La 1:5; stillborn Job 3:16.
